website_summaries.verdict: A stainless-steel water bottle that offers good quality for the price.
pros: This water bottle holds ice and cold temperatures a long time
With 8 sizes and 24 color choices on this stainless steel water bottle there is a style that will work for you
cons: The lids on this model sometimes have problems with good seals
Cold drinks will not stay cold quite as long as some other choices

customer_reviews.title: Like the old lid better and they used to give ...
customer_reviews.text: Lost my old one. Like the old lid better and they used to give you a second lid that was better for water bottle use. UPDATE (17/10/18): lid had failed a number of times so coffee in my bag, getting everything soaked. My was less than a quarter full. Wouldn't have happened with the old lid. Would not but again.

customer_reviews.title: Love this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle. I am an espresso aficionado and have been searching for a good thermos to keep my mini-coffee drinks hot. The Summit bottle is just the right size for a single or double shot plus a little frothed milk if I want a macchiato. I'm also a design geek. I teach design at the college level, and tend to favor well made stylish design. Thanks S|M, you make great products!
customer_reviews.author: Shana Colleen LaFore

customer_reviews.title: Was excited... but...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this thermos by SM, but after a month of having it I notice the lids are not leak proof. I get tea dripping from the sides constantly.
